column3: 1 Chop-Chop 1/4 red bell pepper into tiny bits
3 Place-Place the chopped pepper in the microwave-safe bowl
4 Add-Add 1 tablespoons of water to the bowl
5 Melt-Melt the cheese by microwaving cup for 30 sec. (Check after 30 seconds and microwave for 10 seconds more if needed).
6 Microwave-Microwave the bowl, covered, for 2 minutes
7 Mix-Mix the cheese and red bell pepper in the bowl
9 Add-Add 1/4 teaspoon salt to the bowl
8 Add-Add 1/4 teaspoon pepper to the bowl
10 add-add 1/2 tbsp softened butter to the bowl
11 Mix-Mix all the ingredients of the bowl well
